extension.name: PLG_SYSTEM_CONFIRM_BUTTON
extension.description: System plugin to handle confirm button actions. Dev, Pustik KP, Kemlu

field.name: approved_message
field.label: Approved Message
field.description: Message to send when the registration is approved. Use {first_name} and {last_name} as placeholders.
field.default:
Dear {first_name} {last_name},
Thank you for registering for the 2nd Indonesia-Africa Forum (IAF). Your participation is confirmed for the event in Bali scheduled from September 1-3, 2024.
Please visit our website at iaf.kemlu.go.id for the latest updates on the program, concept note, administrative details, and more. Please be advised that some programs require special access to attend.
Should you require assistance with visa procedures, don't hesitate to get in touch with the Indonesian Embassy in your country.
For any further questions, feel free to email us at iaf.reg@kemlu.go.id.
We are looking forward to welcoming you to Bali.
Warm regards, The 2nd IAF Registration Committee

field.name: waiting_list_message
field.label: Waiting List Message
field.description: Message to send when the registration is put on the waiting list. Use {first_name} and {last_name} as placeholders.
field.default:
Dear {first_name} {last_name},
Thank you for registering for the 2nd Indonesia-Africa Forum (IAF).
Due to overwhelming interest, we have reached our full capacity, and your registration is now on the waiting list.
To follow up on the spot availability, please reach out to us by email at iaf.reg@kemlu.go.id.
Warm regards, The 2nd IAF Registration Committee

field.name: rescinded_message
field.label: Rescinded Message
field.description: Message to send when the registration is rescinded. Use {first_name} and {last_name} as placeholders.
field.default:
Dear {first_name} {last_name},
We regret to inform you that your status for the 2nd Indonesia-Africa Forum (IAF) has been rescinded. Please contact us at iaf.reg@kemlu.go.id if you have any questions or need further assistance.
Warm regards, The 2nd IAF Registration Committee

field.name: rejected_message

field.default:
Dear {first_name} {last_name},
We regret to inform you that your registration for the 2nd Indonesia-Africa Forum (IAF) has been rejected. Please contact us at iaf.reg@kemlu.go.id if you have any questions or need further assistance.
Warm regards, The 2nd IAF Registration Committee

field.name: rescind_rejection_message
field.label: Rescind Rejection Message
field.description: Message to send when the registration rejection is rescinded. Use {first_name} and {last_name} as placeholders.
field.default:
Dear {first_name} {last_name},
Your registration status for the 2nd Indonesia-Africa Forum (IAF) has been changed back to pending. Please contact us at iaf.reg@kemlu.go.id if you have any questions or need further assistance.
